id: ビューワーの使い方メッセージ
translation:
・Use the mouse wheel up and down to zoom in and out
・Click and move the mouse wheel to change the camera position
・Click and move the right mouse button to change the camera direction
・Hold Shift while operating the mouse to increase the movement amount
・Hold Ctrl while operating the mouse to decrease the movement amount
・Enter '1' on the keypad to view from the bottom
・Enter '2' on the keypad to view from the front
・Enter '4' on the keypad to view from the left
・Enter '5' on the keypad to view from the top
・Enter '6' on the keypad to view from the right
・Enter '8' on the keypad to view from the back

id: 再生フォームの使い方
translation: How to use the playback form

id: 再生ウィジェットの使い方メッセージ
translation:
・The 'Play' button becomes clickable when a PMX model is set
・Setting a VMD motion is optional
・Clicking the 'Play' button starts the rendering. The button label changes to 'Pause'
・Clicking the 'Pause' button pauses the rendering. The button label changes to 'Play'
・While paused, you can change the keyframe position with the keyframe number field or slider
・The keyframe number field and slider can adjust the number up and down with the middle mouse wheel

id: コントローラーウィンドウの使い方
translation: How to use the Controller Window

id: コントローラーウィンドウの使い方メッセージ
translation: ・Click on the name of each form part to display how to use that part in the message area.

id: 予期せぬエラーヘッダー

translation: Copy the error and report it in the community

クリップボードコピー失敗
モデル名エンコードエラー
translation: Since the model name ({{.Name}}) contains characters that are unreadable in Japanese or English (environment-dependent characters, foreign language characters, etc.), a temporary model name will be set.

id: ボーン名エンコードエラー
translation: Since the bone name ({{.Name}}) contains characters that are unreadable in Japanese or English (environment-dependent characters, foreign language characters, etc.), it will be skipped.

id: ファイルクローズエラー
translation: Failed to output the file to the file path ({{.Path}}).

id: ボーンフレーム書き込みエラー
translation: Failed to write the bone data.

id: モーフフレーム書き込みエラー
translation: Failed to write the morph data.

id: 固定ビューウィジェット生成エラー
頂点ライン選択使い方メッセージ
translation: With the vertex line selection turned ON, you can select vertices by moving the cursor over them while holding down the left mouse button. Selected vertices are displayed in orange. The cursor's path is displayed in red. You can deselect vertices by tracing over them again with the left mouse button while holding down the Ctrl key.

id: ミップマップ生成エラー
translation: Mipmaps will not be generated because the texture size is not a power of two. Texture name: {{.Name}}
Are you sure you want to exit the app?

The language change on the screen will take effect after restarting.
Do you want to exit the app?

id: &サブビューワーオーバーレイ
&サブビューワーオーバーレイの使い方
サブビューワーオーバーレイの使い方メッセージ
translation:
When checked, the sub-window rendering will be overlaid on the main window.
While checked, operating the main window will also synchronize the movement of the sub-window.
The size of the character model in the sub-window will be approximately matched to the character model in the main window.
You can switch whether to use the upper body or lower body as the alignment reference.

・The frame number field displays the currently rendered frame number.
・You can increase or decrease the frame number by using the mouse wheel in the field or pressing the button to the right of the field.

・The playback slider shows the corresponding position of the currently rendered frame number.
・You can increase or decrease the frame number by using the mouse wheel over the slider.

・Clicking the playback button allows you to play the motion.
・Other buttons or operations cannot be used during playback.

The file does not exist
Input file path: {{.Path}}

The input file path has an unsupported file extension
Input file path: {{.Path}}, Allowed extensions: {{.Ext}}

id: システム用ボーン追加失敗

translation: Since the default FBO sample count is not 4, MSAA is replaced with a type using an intermediate FBO

id: 焼き込み再生ループ再開: 焼き込み履歴INDEX[%d]
translation: Resume Bake Playback Loop: Bake History INDEX [%d]

id: ボーン表示の使い方メッセージ
translation:
・Turning ON bone display will show the model's bones
・You can select the types of bones to display from the menu
・Multiple types can be displayed at the same time
・While bones are displayed, clicking near a bone will show a list of nearby bone names.

id: 剛体表示の使い方メッセージ
translation:
・Turning ON rigid body display will show the model's rigid bodies
・In front display mode, rigid bodies are shown over the model
・In embedded display mode, only the parts of the rigid bodies sticking out from the model are shown
・While rigid bodies are displayed, clicking on a rigid body will show its name and group.
